defaultTab.fieldDescription: The chosen default tab will be opened on page load.
defaultTab.name: ./defaultTab1

image.fieldDescription: Image size should be 150x150 or less.
image.name: ./image1

listeners.blur: function(){ var imgPath=this.getValue(); var imgType=imgPath.trim().substring(imgPath.length - 3); if(imgType != "jpg" && imgType != "gif" && imgType != "png"){ CQ.Ext.Msg.show ({'title':CQ.I18n.getMessage('News Tab Image Validation'), 'msg':CQ.I18n.getMessage('The path specified is not a valid image. Choose a file with an extension of jpg, gif or png.'), 'buttons':CQ.Ext.Msg.OK, 'icon':CQ.Ext.MessageBox.ERROR, 'scope':this});} }

pciRegional.fieldDescription: There can only be one regional tab. If regional is selected, PCI ID is not needed.
pciRegional.name: ./pciRegional1

pciCategoryId.fieldDescription: If tab set to 'regional', the category ID will be unused.
pciCategoryId.name: ./pciId1

resultsCount.fieldDescription: This will be the max number of results shown.
resultsCount.name: ./resultCount1
